title: GDPR for Healthcare
headline: This free online course is a basic introduction to GDPR for healthcare describing essential fundamental regulations.
description: The GDPR is a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy. This course provides you with an understanding of GDPR and both personal data and general data regulations in the healthcare sector. We assist you in analysing the lawful basis for GDPR for healthcare, its responsibilities and obligations. In addition, we answer questions relating to the challenges of implementation and the benefits of applying GDPR to healthcare.

courseDescription:
The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) is a regulation in EU law on data protection and privacy in the European Union (EU) and the European Economic Area (EEA) that we have applied to healthcare organisations. This course provides accurate knowledge of personal data, GDPR for healthcare and the basic terminology. It explains the characteristics and functions of the tools that guide you through specific information about examining the healthcare setting and personal data. You will also study ways GDPR can change healthcare settings. We provide the answers relating to general data protection regulations and discuss the fundamental changes to the law and the tools you will use. We teach you to assess the diverse ways of applying the basic requirements of the law.

Following this, we will equip you with the tools you will need to develop your lawful basis for preparing for using GDPR for healthcare. Learn to use the tools on the appropriate lawful basis’ correctly and ‘the responsibilities and obligations of organisations’, including understanding what mistakes to avoid. Next, you will discover how to troubleshoot the errors in the role of the data protection officer in the healthcare industry. Finally, we explain how to set up electronic medical records and research its implementation challenges.

This course will provide you with the skills required to use GDPR for healthcare if you are a beginner. It provides accurate and straightforward techniques you can apply in your working field. This approach is ideal for those starting to use GDPR in the healthcare environment or employees who want to learn how to understand it. Register for this course and become assured in using GDPR.
